title: Increase in the membership of the Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space
text:
United Nations 
A/C.4/80/L.11
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
24 October 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-17047 (E)    301025     
*2517047* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Special Political and Decolonization Committee 
(Fourth Committee) 
Agenda item 48 
International cooperation in the peaceful uses of outer space 
 
 
 
Austria, France, Germany, Honduras, Maldives, South Africa, Spain and 
Zimbabwe: draft decision 
 
 
Increase in the membership of the Committee on the Peaceful Uses 
of Outer Space  
 
 
 
The General Assembly, taking note of the applications of Honduras, Maldives 
and Zimbabwe for membership in the Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer 
Space, as noted in paragraph 306 of the report of the Committee on its sixty-eighth 
session, held in Vienna from 25 June to 2 July 2025,1 decides to appoint Honduras, 
Maldives and Zimbabwe as members of the Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer 
Space. 
 
__________________ 
 
1  Official Records of the General Assembly, Eightieth Session, Supplement No. 20 (A/80/20).
